Package index

Package

Package documentation

TrajConserve TrajConserve-package trajConserve trajConserve-package
TrajConserve: Trajectory Conservation Analysis Tools for Single-Cell Data

Core Trajectory Functions

Functions for trajectory modeling and conservation analysis

seurat_to_trajectory_array()
Convert Seurat Object to 3D Expression Array
bayesian_gam_regression_nb_shape()
This function fits a Bayesian Generalized Additive Model with negative binomial distribution and array-specific shape parameters to model gene expression trajectories.
run_multiple_models()
Run Trajectory Models for Multiple Genes
run_trajectory_model()
Run Bayesian GAM Model for a Single Gene
calculate_conservation()
Calculate Gene Conservation Scores

Visualization Functions

Functions for visualizing results

plot_results_brms()
Plot Results from Bayesian GAM Regression
plot_conservation()
Plot Conservation Results
plot_hdf5_heatmap()
Plot Heatmap from HDF5 Metrics

HDF5 Utilities

Functions for working with HDF5 files

extract_hdf5_metric()
Extract Metric from HDF5 File

Helper Functions

Utility functions

prepare_data_for_gam()
Prepare 3D Array Data for GAM Modeling
bin_pseudotime()
This function bins pseudotime values into a specified number of equal-width bins.
calculate_bin_means()
Calculate Bin Means Fast
reshape_to_3d()
Reshape Matrix to 3D Array
examine_trajectory_tail()
Check Quality of Trajectory Tail
